title: TUTORIAL Miniature cherries with branch | PDF + video
description: The price includes a tutorial on creating colorful miniature cherries with polymer clay for dollhouses at a scale of 1:12. This tutorial is a PDF file with a description of materials, a link to the video, and text in English. For your convenience, the video is uploaded to YouTube and has English subtitles. An active link to the video is inside the PDF file or via QR code. Please note that the video does not have voice acting!In this tutorial, I'll show you how to create coloâ€¦
